column2: an A.M. Eatery////Snooze has a great atmosphere--games and free coffee while you wait for your table. The menu is extensive
column3: both food and drink. Unfortunately I was not able to try any of there boozey concoctions (it was Sunday before 10AM). Due to popularity
column4: the kitchen seemed very backed up. The food was definitely worth the wait though. We had the Sweet Potato Hash and the OMG French Toast --both were excellent.
